feed.title: Matthew L. Davis | Biostatistics Research
feed.subtitle: Personal website featuring research in biostatistics, R package development, and statistical methods for microbiome data analysis.

entry.title: Welcome to My Statistics Website
entry.content: Welcome to my new website featuring my research in biostatistics, focusing on microbiome data analysis and smoothing splines.
